about_the_game:
The adventure of Axel, is an adventure in which you must find the way to pass different mazes and puzzles to be able to rescue your sister.
Immerse yourself in a world full of magic and fantasy where Axel, a teenager who for different reasons loses his sister and decides to rescue her before something worse can happen, so he has just entered an old mine to undertake a mysterious adventure .

In this demo you can try one of the maps of the game and enjoy it.

You can play with the mouse or the arrow keys to move the character. You can "enter the key" with the different characters of the actions.

For any questions:
Facebook: Axel's Adventure

name: La Aventura De Axel Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo o superior
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This fantastic and spectacular adventure, put yourself in the skin of Axel, a young man who for strange and mysterious circumstances lost his sister and took a long and incredible way to try to rescue her. In this demo you can try one of the maps of the game and test its playability.
